item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - Charli XCX - 3 EPs (Vroom Vroom, Number 1 Angel & Pop2) Qobuz Full Lossless Quality [AIF,FLAC,ALAC,WAV]
item.description:
Each Pack contains each of the following releases in all four formats separated by format in the links below:
2016 - Vroom Vroom
2017 - Number One Angel
2017 - Pop 2

I couldn't seem to find these releases anywhere without significant compression. So I purchased them from Qobuz and uploaded all lossless versions, AIF, ALAC, FLAC, & WAV. The FLAC version I converted from the AIF files via Xrecode3 with 0 compression and also replay gain scanned with both album and track level info via foobar2000 and there are synced lyrics embedded in the tags.




Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
AIF Zip 881 Mbs
ALAC Zip 632MBs
FLAC Zip 881 MBs
WAV Zip 881 MBs
item.author: james702283
